1531050.name: C-130 Animation
1531050.description: C-130 Medical Simulation. Walk around in a cargo jet. The medical simulation deals with the hospital beds that are used in the cargo plane the C-130 is a cargo plane that is used in military all over the world this is a simulation of a medical room inside the aircraft. The vr game allows the user  to move around in the environment the environment is not an exact scale, was created through images and artistic depiction and dramatic interpretations . The genre is animation and modeling, and can be used by almost any one. Those with prior medical disorders. Attached here is a seizure warning, no liability for the use of this app. Due to concerns on intellectual properties certain textures have been removed, and the external frame of the cargo plane.
1531050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
